readable.title: 3261666285_86fceb762d
readable.content: A basketball player in white is trying to defend against the player in black who is dribbling the ball . An african american runs with a basketball as a caucasion tries to take the ball from him . Guy in black uniform dribbling basketball away from guy in white uniform Two teams are playing basketball as one man is driving towards the hoop . White player attempts to get ball from black player on basketball court .
